meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a gypsy.
meanings.sent1: In her heart, she longed for the freedom of gypsydoms.
meanings.sent2: The colorful caravans painted a picture of gypsydoms on the open road.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cat living a life of gypsydoms made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His nomadic spirit embraced the essence of gypsydoms, wandering without boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The music festival was a celebration of gypsydoms, with lively dances and vibrant music.

meanings.definition: The lifestyle or culture associated with gypsies.
meanings.sent1: The market was filled with trinkets that reflected the essence of gypsydoms.
meanings.sent2: She was fascinated by the rich history of gypsydoms and their traditions.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin adopting gypsydoms as a lifestyle was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her free-spirited nature embraced the colorful tapestry of gypsydoms.
meanings.sent5: The campfire tales painted a vivid picture of the mystical world of gypsydoms.
